attributes.comment:
The fee increases proposed by this new legislation seem to be astronomical. US
Citizens are trying to adopt children to add to their families as well as give
children a home who may otherwise grow up with out a family. The cost of
adoption is already very costly. To raise the fees by this substantial amount
will hurt many people trying to adopt children. In addition, I wonder if the
department has considered the amount of economic revenue brought to the country
when these children enter. The parents adopting the children raise them like
any other American citizen and their adoption helps create revenue for the
American economy. The government needs to reconsider these fees and give these
families trying to adopt children a break for once.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
